unittitle_ssm: Edward B. Watson collection of World War I and World War II illustrations and cartoons
abstract_ssm: This collection consists of color illustrations and black-and-white cartoons relating to air, land, and sea activities during World War I and World War II. The cartoons were collected by Edward B. Watson and were clipped from various New York City newspapers and magazines.
subject_ssm: American newspapers -- New York (State) -- New York
American periodicals -- New York (State) -- New York
World War, 1914-1918 -- Art and the war
World War, 1939-1945 -- Art and the war
collection_ssm: Edward B. Watson collection of World War I and World War II illustrations and cartoons
